title: Dirty Sue - Novel Updates
tags: Cheats   Depictions of Cruelty   Evil Protagonist   Fantasy World   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: 冬塚おんぜ
description:
Dirty Sue is a transmigrator specialized in dirty work from another world.

He receives requests from fellows who don’t have a bright life and future living in various worlds and blocks the way of those that normally would have been called the protagonists of the story.

Kicking away the government with his shoes.

Ignoring the sermons with a smile.

All dishes are consumed.

Being the Devil that whispers to the Villain Miss.

Being the collar of the Evil Dragon.

Harassing the revenge of the former Hero.

Every day like today, Dirty Sue will be fighting.

To ascertain the Justice of those so called ‘protagonist’.>
